title: SketchRNN Snowflakes with ml5.js
description: In this holiday coding challenge, I use ml5.js and Sketch-RNN to generate snowflake drawings.

codeExamples.title: SketchRNN snowflakes
codeExamples.description: This sketch uses sketchRNN to generate snowflakes.

links.title: Magenta Project
links.description: Webpage with background and references on the Magenta project.

links.title: Draw Together with a Neural Network
links.description: Try out the new magic-sketchpad game!

links.title: Text Generation with LSTM and Spell with Nabil Hassein
links.description: Nabil Hassein demonstrates how to train an "LSTM" neural network to generate text in the style of a particular author using Spell and ml5.js.

links.title: Coding Challenge #122: Quick, Draw!
links.description: In this coding challenge, I take a closer look at the Quick, Draw! dataset and create a simple node API to "replay" drawings of rainbows and cats using p5.js.

links.title: Coding Train Live Holiday Telethon 2018
links.description: In this fundraiser, I sing holiday songs and do three snowflake coding challenges.
